function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal signs with general information initially provided to consumers may not effectively communicate specific social distancing rules","Impact":"Increased risk of customers not understanding or following social distancing guidelines, leading to potential virus spread","Mitigation":"Develop clear and specific social distancing guidelines for different settings and ensure they are effectively communicated to customers through appropriate signage and messaging","Technologies":"Clear and visible signage, digital displays, communication platforms","People":"Customers, retail staff","Owner":"Retail management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Customer uncertainty due to unreadable signage and lack of clear information about open services and hours of operation","Impact":"Potential confusion and frustration for customers, leading to increased risk of non-compliance with safety measures and suboptimal shopping experience","Mitigation":"Design and implement clear, visible, and informative signage with appropriate font size and color contrast, provide accurate and updated information about services and operating hours","Technologies":"Large format printing, color printing, digital displays","People":"Customers, retail staff, management","Owner":"Retail management, marketing and communication teams"},{"Description":"Difficulty in accessing digitized information for customers without online access","Impact":"Exclusion of customers from accessing important product information and pricing, potentially leading to unequal shopping experiences","Mitigation":"Provide alternative methods for accessing product information and pricing, such as printed flyers or in-store displays, ensure accessibility to information for all customers","Technologies":"Printed flyers, in-store displays, tactile information resources","People":"Customers without online access, retail staff","Owner":"Retail management, marketing and communication teams"}]}
